00112 template<typename UIntType, UIntType a, UIntType c, UIntType m>
00113   class linear_congruential_engine
00114 {
00115   public:
00116     // types
00117     
00121     typedef UIntType result_type;
00122 
00123     // engine characteristics
00124 
00127     static const result_type multiplier = a;
00128 
00131     static const result_type increment = c;
00132 
00135     static const result_type modulus = m;
00136 
00139     static const result_type min = c == 0u ? 1u : 0u;
00140 
00143     static const result_type max = m - 1u;
00144 
00147     static const result_type default_seed = 1u;
00148 
00149     // constructors and seeding functions
00150 
00156     __host__ __device__
00157     explicit linear_congruential_engine(result_type s = default_seed);
00158 
00164     __host__ __device__
00165     void seed(result_type s = default_seed);
00166 
00167     // generating functions
00168 
00172     __host__ __device__
00173     result_type operator()(void);
00174 
00181     __host__ __device__
00182     void discard(unsigned long long z);
00183 
00186   private:
00187     result_type m_x;
00188 
00189     static void transition(result_type &state);
00190 
00191     friend struct thrust::random::detail::random_core_access;
00192 
00193     friend struct thrust::random::detail::linear_congruential_engine_discard;
00194 
00195     __host__ __device__
00196     bool equal(const linear_congruential_engine &rhs) const;
00197 
00198     template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
00199     std::basic_ostream<CharT,Traits>& stream_out(std::basic_ostream<CharT,Traits> &os) const;
00200 
00201     template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
00202     std::basic_istream<CharT,Traits>& stream_in(std::basic_istream<CharT,Traits> &is);
00203 
00206 }; // end linear_congruential_engine
